ModMetaData.name: MorrowRim - Ashlands Swamp
ModMetaData.author: SirMashedPotato
ModMetaData.description:
Adds a new Morrowind inspired biome, with unique plants, animals and terrain. The soil of the ashlands swamp is highly fertile, though much of it is covered in marsh. Ashstorms are less common, though toxic miasma is commonly released by the miasma sponge. Mudcrabs, whilst of little threat, often carry swamp fever, a disease native to ashlands swamps.

-Supports Vanilla Achievements Expanded.
-Requires Harmony.
-Requires MorrowRim.
-Includes several patches that make animals added by other mods ash resistant.
-Includes several patches to add wild animals and plants to both biomes from other mods.
-Includes several patches for Vanilla Expanded mods.
-Includes a patch for RimBees, adding wild hives.
-Includes a patch for Camouflage and Stealth, with both biomes using jungle camo.
-Based on the 'Elder Scrolls' series by Bethesda Game Studios.
